name: Skwampt
description:
Skwampt is a Yume Nikki-like game about exploring the memories of an alien flying through space. Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

It isn't completely finished yet. There are only 3 Souvenirs to collect (4 including the DSC) and a joke ending.

DEFAULT CONTROLS:

[Arrow Keys] - Movement

[Space] / [Enter] / [Z] - Confirm / Interact

[X] - Cancel / Open Menu

[Shift] - Sprint

[C] - Use Souvenir (currently, no Souvenirs have this. Holding this down without any Souvenir equipped makes you sprint)

[9] - Open DSC Command Menu, which allows you to wake up, return to start, or open the tutorial. You can also open this menu through your Souvenirs inventory.
